title: Villainous Lament
content:
how wracked with guilt he is by his actions and is only doing this to give his people hope.

briefly entertains the idea of giving up and going with Frisk to return to Toriel and be a happy family again, but ultimately decides I've Come Too Far

Asgore: If we could be a family 

Walk through the town 

See my dear Toriel 

And head home right now.
